diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'Type-safe YAML parser and validator.'
  dev_url: https://github.com/crdoconnor/strictyaml
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE.txt'

comments.body:
can you please manually include the `license_file` and add an issue upstream asking that the license be distributed with the source distribution. Please add the url to the issue as a comment here as a reminder to check if it has been added in a future release:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

Thanks. I had meant as a comment in the `meta.yaml`, but I can see how my wording was unclear. I'm going to go ahead and merge, but you might consider adding the license file switch to an issue in the feedstock if that issue gets resolved just as a reminder.
